name: IOC Threat Hunt - FortiAnalyzer
description: Performs FortiAnalyzer IOC Hunting on the specified IOC.

arguments.filter_query: {% set ls_length =vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] | length %}{% set ioc_length = vars.ioc_value | length %}{% for item in vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] %}{% set outer_loop = loop %}{% for ioc in vars.ioc_value %}{% if loop.index < ioc_length %}{{item}}='{{ioc}}' OR {% else %}{{item}}='{{ioc}}'{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% if outer_loop.index < ls_length %} OR {% endif %}{% endfor %}

resource.name: Outbreak IOC Hunt - FortiAnalyzer - {{(arrow.utcnow() | string).split('T')[0]}}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table
Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiAnalyzer
